SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model

Class CardPools

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.CardPools
public class CardPools extends Observable
The CardPools class represents the collection of different card pools in the game. It is observable, allowing observers to be notified of changes to the card pools.

      Returns:
